description: Generate embeddings using Azure OpenAI models.

azure_endpoint.info: Your Azure endpoint, including the resource. Example: `https://example-resource.azure.openai.com/`

azure_deployment.info: The name of your Azure OpenAI deployment

api_version.info: The Azure OpenAI API version to use

dimensions.info: The number of dimensions the resulting output embeddings should have. Only supported by certain models.

status.initializing: Initializing Azure OpenAI Embeddings with model '{model}'...

success.embeddings_initialized: Azure OpenAI Embeddings initialized successfully with model '{model}'

errors.connection_failed: Could not connect to Azure OpenAI Embeddings API: {error}

logs.building_embeddings: Building embeddings - Model: {model}, Endpoint: {endpoint}, Deployment: {deployment}, API Version: {api_version}
